### `sprintf()`

```{r}


## various formats of pi :

sprintf("%f", pi)
sprintf("%.3f", pi)
sprintf("%1.0f", pi)
sprintf("%5.1f", pi)
sprintf("%05.1f", pi)
sprintf("%+f", pi)
sprintf("% f", pi)
sprintf("%-10f", pi) # left justified
sprintf("%e", pi)
sprintf("%E", pi)
sprintf("%g", pi)
sprintf("%g",   1e6 * pi)    # -> exponential
sprintf("%.9g", 1e6 * pi)    # -> "fixed"
sprintf("%G", 1e-6 * pi)

```

### The ``rep() `` command

```{r}
rep( "WH", 10)
rep( c("WH","LD"), 5)
rep( c("WH","LD"), times = 5)
rep( c("WH","LD"), each = 5)
rep( c("WH","LD"), each = 2, times = 3)
rep( c("WH","LD"), times=c(3,7) ) 
```

### The `paste()` command

```{r}

part1 <- rep( c("WH","LD"),5)
part2 <- sprintf("%02.0f", 1:10)

paste(part1,part2)
paste(part1,part2,sep="-") # hyphen seperator
paste(part1,part2,sep="")  # no white space, i.e. no gap
```
